name: Proactive Paul (@proactivepaul@mastodon.social)
summary:
arrived at #DDDEastMidlands 

a false name and a false email is good enough to get you on to the NTU-guest wifi

but you will need the prescribed username and password which you are then given

it is valid for 2 devices max

(yes, I have 3 devices, and hence 2 sets of credentials)
